src_original: bhadantakumāralātaḥ /  uktāḥ sapratighā apratighāśca // [020/04]  eṣāmaṣṭādaśadhātūnāṃ kati kuśalāḥ katyakuśalāḥ katyavyākṛtā / [020/05]
ta evārūpaśabdakāḥ // VAkK_1.29 // [020/08]  pañcendriyāṇi gandharasaspraṣṭavyā dhātavaśca / [020/08-020/09]  ete 'ṣṭau kuśalākuśalabhāvenāvyākaraṇādavyākṛtāḥ / [020/09]
tgt_original: rūpaṃ śabdaḥ saptavijñānāni dharmaśca (iti daśa dhātavaḥ)  kuśalā akuśalā avyākṛtāśca |  13 | katamat kuśalarūpaṃ |  kuśala kāyavijñaptiḥ |
